sentences.english: The deep connection between Sami herders and the reindeer is hundreds of years old.
sentences.chinese: 萨米牧人和驯鹿之间的深厚关系有成百上千年的历史。

sentences.english: and some native peoples in Mongolia and northern Russia ride reindeer.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古和俄罗斯北部的一些原住民还骑驯鹿。

sentences.english: Gelda rode the reindeer and went to the Castle of Snow.
sentences.chinese: 盖尔达骑着驯鹿去了寒冰城堡。

sentences.english: He has a sleigh and reindeers.
Spring in northern Canada means the migration of three million caribou across the arctic tundra.
sentences.chinese: 春天的到来带来了加拿大北部三百万头驯鹿的大迁徙。

sentences.english: A brace of tame deer ran familiarly about the house.
sentences.chinese: 一对驯鹿无拘无束地在室内跑来跑去。

sentences.english: Santa shouted out the reindeers' names and cracked his whip.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞老人喊出驯鹿的名字，猛抽他的鞭子。

sentences.english: The Ket allowed their reindeer to wander during summer and kept them close to camp during winter.
sentences.chinese: 偈人让驯鹿在夏天游放，冬天将其留在营地附近。

sentences.english: And 160 reindeer herders have already been evicted from their pastures.
sentences.chinese: 160个放牧驯鹿的牧民已经被赶出自己的牧场。

sentences.english: Will be the annual Christmas reindeer run wild and turn the corner as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 每年圣诞节的驯鹿将会疯狂的奔跑并尽快的拐过弯角。

sentences.english: Wear a Santa hat or reindeer ears during your run.
sentences.chinese: 比如，你可以带着圣诞老人帽或者驯鹿耳朵跑步。

sentences.english: She was discovered by a reindeer herder on a river bank in northwestern Siberia.
sentences.chinese: 一名驯鹿牧人在西伯利亚西北方的河岸找到了牠。

sentences.english: Santa is riding on the sleigh pulled by reindeers.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞老人驾着驯鹿拉的雪橇。

sentences.english: 4 years ago the Tsaatan had fewer than 500 reindeer.
Authorities want a barrier between the animals and everyone else.
sentences.chinese: 有关当局希望将驯鹿和人用栏栅隔离开。

definition: Père David's deer (Elaphurus davidianus), species of deer native to China that is critically endangered
the Sami people, indigenous people in northern Scandinavia
Ewenke ethnic group of Inner Mongolia
Inuit (politically correct term for Eskimo 愛斯基摩人|爱斯基摩人)
Eskimo/also called Inuit 因紐特|因纽特
